Thank you! I am seeing the same nightstands listed on Walmart for $167.00. Is there a way to price match?

Sauder: Happy to help, and thank you so much for sharing those details. We strive to offer the best possible options available to our consumers when it comes to purchasing our products. Our intention is not to compete with our retailers on price and service but to simply offer online shopping as a convenience.
Where else is the dresser sold outside of your website directly?

Sauder: I'll be happy to check this for you. Can you please share the specific item you're eyeing and your zip code?
